cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
Each bed is a wide king single bunk bed with a thick mattress.  Bed linen, private locker and power socket with USB charging is provided.  Extra Long Beds (> 2 metres), Heating, Carpeted, Shared Bathroom.

Free unlimited WiFi in all rooms.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Standard Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription:
Single rooms include a TV, secure locker, power point and USB charging, heating, carpeted, thick mattress, bed linen, towels and access to a shared bathroom.

Free unlimited WiFi is available in all rooms.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
This air conditioned double room comes with a TV, personal locker, power point with USB charging, bed linen and towels. Carpeted. 1 double bed. Shared bathroom facilities are located nearby.  Skylight only - no window.

Free unlimited WiFi in all rooms.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Double private room comes with a TV, personal locker, heating, power point with USB charging, bed linen and towels. Carpeted.1 double bed.  Shared bathroom facilities, with excellent showers, are nearby.
Free unlimited WiFi in all rooms.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.name: Superior Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
1 double bed with thick mattress and all bed linen and towels are included. There is a private bathroom, personal locker, TV, heating and power plugs with USB charging. Carpeted.

Free unlimited WiFi in all rooms.

privates.name: Standard 4 Bed Family Room Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
1 double bed and 2 bunk beds, all bed linen and towels included, personal lockers, power plugs with USB charging and heating. Shared bathroom facilities, with excellent showers, are nearby..  Maximum occupancy is 4.
Free unlimited WiFi in all rooms.
